T02D1563:222a-1: badzra yo gi n'i aa bhi she ka sam kshe pa n'a ma /
T02D1563:222a-3: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dbang mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1563:222a-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1563:222a-5: spros pa dang bcas zhal nas gsungs pa mang yod kyang //
T02D1563:222a-6: spros bral mos pa bdag 'dra'i byin rlabs don //
T02D1563:222a-7: phag mo mngon 'byung rgyud la brten nas ni //
T02D1563:222a-8: byin rlabs mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1563:222a-9: de la snying po'i don do sprod pa'i man ngag la thun mong gi dbang dang /
T02D1563:222a-10: thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1563:222a-11: de la thun mong gi dbang ni bum pa'i dbang la sogs pa'i rig pa'i dbang lnga'o //
T02D1563:222a-12: thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i byin rlabs kyi dbang ngo //
T02D1563:222a-13: de la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i byin rlabs kyi
T02D1563:222a-14: dbang ni dang po dur khrod la sogs pa dben
T02D1563:222a-15: pa'i gnas su sa gzhi brtag pa la sogs pa
T02D1563:222a-16: byas pa'i rjes su lhag gnas gsum ni gzhan nas
T02D1563:222a-17: shes par bya'o // de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1563:222a-18: ma'i byin rlabs kyi dus su dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin
T02D1563:222a-20: dbus gru gsum bsnol ma la dga' ba 'khyil ba bri /
T02D1563:222a-21: de'i mthar padma 'dab ma bcu drug gam brgyad la rdo rje me ris 'khor bar bri'o //
T02D1563:222a-22: dbang bskur ba'i rdzas ni de'i steng du bum pa dmar po gsum gyi nang du /
T02D1563:222a-23: rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang rdzas gzhan chu la sogs pas bkang la /
T02D1563:222a-24: kha rgyan dang mgul chings dmar pos brgyan te gzhag
T02D1563:222a-25: / dbu rgyan dang rdo rje dril bu rtsar gzhag
T02D1563:222a-26: / de'i steng du thod pa mtshan nyid dang ldan
T02D1563:222a-28: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bu mo gzhon nu ma
T02D1563:222a-29: bcu drug ma'am nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i lag pas
T02D1563:222a-30: chang gis thod pa 'gengs su gzhug go //
T02D1563:222a-31: de la mtshan ma brtag par bya'o //
T02D1563:222a-32: de nas bu mos mchod pa byas yon yang dbul lo //
T02D1563:222a-33: de'i dgos pa ni rtags rab 'bring gsum gang rung cig byung ba dang /
T02D1563:222a-34: de'i steng du me long g-ya' dag pa la gur
T02D1563:222a-35: kum gyi chus bkrus la sindh'u ra btsags la gser
T02D1563:222a-36: smyug gis gru gsum bsnol ma bri /
T02D1563:222b-0: @222b de'i dbus su sngags kyi rgyal po bris la /
T02D1563:222b-1: de las sngags gzhan yang g-yon skor du bri'o //
T02D1563:222b-3: de'ang ras dmar pos zhal khebs bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-4: de'ang mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzas la /
T02D1563:222b-5: mkha' 'gro ma mchod pa'i rdzas ni zhal gcig ma'i
T02D1563:222b-6: dbang du byas nas mchod pa bzhi bzhir bya zhing
T02D1563:222b-7: / me tog dmar po sha bzhi chu las skyes dang thang las skyes /
T02D1563:222b-8: spos sna bzhi la gu gul nag po dang aa ru ra sha chen dang bzhi'o //
T02D1563:222b-9: dri sna bzhi ni tsandan dang gla rtsi dang ga pur dang gur kum mo //
T02D1563:222b-10: sgron me sna bzhi la 'bru mar dang mar dkar la sogs pa las bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-11: lha bshos sna bzhi 'bras la sogs pa las bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-12: de dag ni khro mo'i zhal du mchod pa'o //
T02D1563:222b-13: de la gtor ma'i ken [?] ni chang sna bzhi la 'bru chang sbrang chang gnyis //
T02D1563:222b-14: bur chang 'bras chang gnyis te bzhi'o //
T02D1563:222b-15: khur ba sna bzhi la gru gsum zla gam gnyis /
T02D1563:222b-16: zlum po gru bzhi gnyis te bzhi'o //
T02D1563:222b-17: sha sna bzhi la mi sha rta sha khyi sha ba lang dang bzhi'o //
T02D1563:222b-18: bdud rtsi sna bzhi la byang sems dkar dmar gnyis dang dri chen dri chu gnyis te bzhi'o //
T02D1563:222b-19: phag gdong gi zhal du mchod pa'i rdzas so //
T02D1563:222b-20: de ltar mchod pa la sogs pa'i rdzas bshams pa dang /
T02D1563:222b-21: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i bskyed rim la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-22: de nas skyo na bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-23: de nas bstod pa bya ste mchod pa dang tshogs dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-24: de nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-26: mchod pa dang rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1563:222b-27: de nas slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba ni
T02D1563:222b-28: slob ma rnams la mig ras dmar pos bkab ste
T02D1563:222b-29: / las kyi slob dpon gyis nang du drangs te /
T02D1563:222b-30: bgegs bskrad la dkyil 'khor gyi shar nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1563:222b-32: de ring khyod mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi rigs
T02D1563:222b-33: su gzhug gi / ye shes gang gis mkha' 'gro
T02D1563:222b-34: ma kun gyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur la /
T02D1563:222b-35: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te de
T02D1563:222b-36: lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes ngas khyod la bskyed
T02D1563:222b-37: par bya yis / khyod kyis rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1563:222b-38: ma'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi drung du
T02D1563:223a-1: gal te khyod kyis smras na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur te /
T02D1563:223a-2: de nas yang 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste /
T02D1563:223a-3: gal te tshul 'di gang su yang rung ba'i drung du bzlas na /
T02D1563:223a-4: khyod kyi mgo rdo rje rnal 'byor mas 'gas par byed do //
T02D1563:223a-5: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma khyod dengs //
T02D1563:223a-6: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02D1563:223a-7: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1563:223a-8: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1563:223a-9: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1563:223a-10: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D1563:223a-11: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D1563:223a-13: aom badzra d'a k'i n'i aa mri to da ka / de nas 'di brjod de /
T02D1563:223a-14: de ring phan chad khyod kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nga yin gyi /
T02D1563:223a-15: ngas gang gyis [*gis] brjod pa de bu khyod kyis bya dgos la /
T02D1563:223a-16: nga la brnyas pa'i las ma byed cig / gal
T02D1563:223a-17: te byas na yang ba ma spangs par tshe 'di'i
T02D1563:223a-19: sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su lhung bar gyur ta re /
T02D1563:223a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad
T02D1563:223a-22: kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma
T02D1563:223a-24: de nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02D1563:223a-26: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02D1563:223a-27: mkha' 'gro'i rigs kyi rim pa bzhin //
T02D1563:223a-28: bsod nams gang yin de bzhin shog //
T02D1563:223a-29: 'dis ni dngos grub gang thob pa //
T02D1563:223a-30: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
T02D1563:223a-31: 'di la bsod nams ci yod pa //
T02D1563:223a-32: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog / badzra d'a ki n'i badzra ho:/
T02D1563:223a-33: lha gang gis dngos grub thob pa brtag par bya'o //
T02D1563:223a-34: de nas me tog blangs la slob ma'i mgo la gang gas par bya'o ;
T02D1563:223a-36: aom rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyod nyid kyis //
T02D1563:223a-37: mig dbye bar ni nan tan mdzad //
T02D1563:223a-38: phye bas thams cad mthong 'gyur la //
T02D1563:223a-39: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02D1563:223a-41: de nas slob ma la lha'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o //
T02D1563:223a-42: de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste //
T02D1563:223a-43: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams la //
T02D1563:223a-44: mchod chen ji ltar mdzad pa ltar //
T02D1563:223a-45: bdag kyang rab tu bsgrub slad du //
T02D1563:223a-46: dbang bskur dam pa bdag la stsol //
T02D1563:223a-48: de nas bum pas dbang bskur ba //
T02D1563:223a-49: sangs rgyas kun gyi bum pa'i dbang //
T02D1563:223a-50: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-0: sangs rgyas kun ni rab @223b bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-1: bum pa'i dbang ni khyod la bskur //
T02D1563:223b-2: bum pa byang chub sems kyis bkang //
T02D1563:223b-3: spyi bo nas tshangs pa'i bug pa na mar song
T02D1563:223b-4: bas bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi lhag ma spyi bor mi
T02D1563:223b-5: bskyod par bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D1563:223b-6: de nas dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1563:223b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan dbang //
T02D1563:223b-8: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-9: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-10: dbu rgyan dbang ni khyod la bskur //
T02D1563:223b-11: de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1563:223b-12: sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu'i dbang //
T02D1563:223b-13: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-14: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-15: dril bu'i dbang ni khyod la bskur //
T02D1563:223b-16: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba ni //
T02D1563:223b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang //
T02D1563:223b-18: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-19: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-20: ming gi dbang ni khyod la bskur //
T02D1563:223b-21: zhes ma rig pa las gnas gyur nas rig pa ye shes su bsgrub pas rig pa'i dbang bzhi'o //
T02D1563:223b-22: da ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1563:223b-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi thod pa'i dbang //
T02D1563:223b-24: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-25: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-26: gsang ba'i dbang 'di khyod kyis long //
T02D1563:223b-27: zhes thod pa'i chang 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D1563:223b-28: de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba ni //
T02D1563:223b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi me long dbang //
T02D1563:223b-30: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D1563:223b-31: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1563:223b-32: shes rab ye shes khyod kyis long //
T02D1563:223b-33: skabs 'dir rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom ste //
T02D1563:223b-34: rang gi lte ba'i nang du me long gi dkyil 'khor 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02D1563:223b-35: phag gdong gi dpral bar g-yung drung ris dmar po 'khor bar bsams la //
T02D1563:223b-36: srin po'i zhal cung zad bsdom mo //
T02D1563:223b-37: gsum ba'i don dran pas bsgom mo //
T02D1563:223b-38: de la dbang bzhi ba'i thun mong ma yin pa'i
T02D1563:223b-39: lta ba phyag rgya chen po'i don ji lta ba
T02D1563:223b-40: bzhin du rtogs par byas la /
T02D1563:223b-41: gang du yang gnas par mi bya'o //
T02D1563:223b-42: de yang brda sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan bar bya'o //
T02D1563:223b-43: de lta bu'i byin rlabs thob pa'i slob mas bla ma la yon phul nas mnyes par bya ste /
T02D1563:223b-44: mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma gtang /
T02D1563:223b-45: tshogs kyi 'khor los mnyes par byas nas gtor ma gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1563:224a-0: de nas rdul tshon gshegs la yi ge @224a * //
T02D1563:224a-1: brgya pas kha bskang bar bya'o //
T02D1563:224a-2: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i byin brlabs kyi cho ga
T02D1563:224a-3: mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa thob pa
T02D1563:224a-4: sha ba ri zhags kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1563:224a-6: // / rgya gar gyi yul ma ga dh'a'i pandi ta
T02D1563:224a-7: goo ta ma bha dra'i zhal snga nas mnyan te
T02D1563:224a-8: / lo ts'a ma sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
T02D1563:224a-9: gtsang tshong dus mgur mo'i sa cha /
